title: Ava and Pip
description: An endearing tween story about friendship, family, identity, and inspirationOutgoing Ava loves her older sister, Pip, but can't understand why Pip is so reserved and never seems to make friends with others. When Ava uses her writing talents to help her sister overcome her shyness, both girls learn the impact their words and stories can have on the world around them.
author: Carol Weston
